articles.title: Building Resilient Microservices with Circuit Breakers
articles.description: A deep dive into implementing circuit breaker patterns in distributed systems, with practical examples using Elixir and Java.
articles.excerpt: Learn how to prevent cascading failures in your microservices architecture with circuit breakers, retries, and fallback mechanisms.

articles.title: Rust for Systems Programming: A Java Developer's Perspective
articles.description: Comparing Rust's memory safety and performance guarantees with Java's garbage collection in systems programming contexts.
articles.excerpt: Discover how Rust's ownership model and zero-cost abstractions make it ideal for performance-critical systems.

articles.title: Optimizing Database Performance at Scale
articles.description: Practical techniques for database optimization that reduced query times by 40% in production systems.
articles.excerpt: From indexing strategies to query rewriting, learn the battle-tested approaches for database performance optimization.

articles.title: Real-time Data Processing with Elixir GenStage
articles.description: Implementing back-pressure-aware data pipelines using Elixir's GenStage for high-throughput systems.
articles.excerpt: Explore how GenStage enables building scalable, fault-tolerant data processing pipelines with automatic flow control.

articles.title: TypeScript in Backend Development: Best Practices
articles.description: Leveraging TypeScript's type system for building robust Node.js applications and APIs.
articles.excerpt: From strict typing to advanced patterns, learn how to use TypeScript effectively in backend development.

writingStyle: I write about practical systems engineering challenges, sharing real-world solutions and lessons learned from building scalable distributed systems. My articles focus on implementation details, performance considerations, and architectural patterns that developers can apply in their daily work.
